```{r setup, include = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
lizards <- read_csv(here('data/lizard.csv'))
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = SV_length, y = weight, color = sex)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_dark()
```
